=API for classpath=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.classpath))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_classpath_) classpath] [#(_classpath-directories_) classpath-directories] [#(_classpath-jarfiles_) classpath-jarfiles] 

----
===(_classpath_)===
<pre> Returns a sequence of File objects of the elements on CLASSPATH.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/classpath.clj#20 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=classpath+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_classpath-directories_)===
<pre> Returns a sequence of File objects for the directories on classpath.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/classpath.clj#27 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=classpath-directories+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_classpath-jarfiles_)===
<pre> Returns a sequence of JarFile objects for the JAR files on classpath.</pre>
